title: is it sad i feel proud of this?
body:
i got 2 yasuo pentakills in one bot game and i feel like i shouldn't be proud but it's my first yasuo penta buit its a BOTS game.
idk what to think lol

replies.body: Penta in aram? Thats where all the bots are.
haha, but that is starting to get annoying, and it's even started creeping into regular summoners rift games.
The BE grind is discouraging players and incentivising bots.
it shows you've gotten the hang of yasou, but it doesn't really count as a 'true pentakill'. Heck I can 1v5 the intermediate bots and win as janna (granted with a rageblade ap/onhit build).
Can you play a game and 1 v 5 the bots
yeah be proud, sometimes bots are annoying :v
